title: Top Five Movie Twists and Bill Simmons on ‘Those Who Wish Me Dead’
description:
Sean and Amanda break down a handful of new releases because, well, vaccination rates are growing, theaters are open, and movies are being released (0:25). They discuss HBO Max’s ‘Those Who Wish Me Dead’ with Bill Simmons (4:10); break down Netflix’s new Amy Adams thriller, ‘The Woman in the Window’ (38:57); and then share their top five favorite movie twists (59:18). 
Hosts: Sean Fennessey and Amanda Dobbins
Guest: Bill Simmons
Producer: Bobby Wagner
Additional Production: Sasha Ashall
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
